prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with bright blue scales and a silver mane.
Imagine a bipedal creature that loves to explore mountainous regions, featuring a striking blue color.
Show me a Pokemon that looks friendly, with a round body and a playful demeanor.
Generate a small Pokemon that resembles a dragon and has a shiny silver accessory.
Design a unique Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing blue and yellow colors.

Give me a visual representation of a dragon Pokemon that has a fun and mischievous personality.
